title: What’s the best free music site without ads playing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Honestly, just spend the monthly fee to get Spotify premium. I’ve had it since 2011. I’d get rid of my Cable and Internet, before I would get rid of Spotify (and yes I realize Spotify wouldn’t be much use without the internet). It’s seriously saved me so much money in music listening costs. I use it everyday, for at least 5 hours a day. Never hear an ad, can listen on any device. No I don’t work for them, I just really dig their product.
Why doesn't anyone ever answer questions like this? It's like they don't really read the question, they just want to share some BS. I guess the answer is “there isn't one.”
